knimeNode.name: TracingXmlOut
knimeNode.shortDescription: Sends a report on the investigated case number back to the web service, which needs to be defined in a preceding 'SupplyChain Xml Reader'.

ports.inPort: Table with Station data - including scores.
Table with Delivery data - including scores.
An image that is part of the report. Most probably an image from the outport of a TracingView is chosen here.
